goals__remit:
Geo4cast is a B2B startup. 
She is a software editor on realtime and predictive geolocation for the transport & mobility industries. 
 
Our vision is to cope with the problems of congestion, pollution, multimode transports services... 
 
We are focused on using massive data and AI to develop advanced products with strong cooperation with Research Labs of different universities. 
 
We already work with large companies like Air France, SNCF, French Ministries ...  
We were awarded in 2015 by COP21 for a product optimizing sportsmen transportation and reducing till 30% km and CO2 emissions. 
 
We are part of the FrenchMission for AI and member of the Hub FranceIA
